name: (Han)

Weapon1.PrimaryD: Fires two shots back-to-back, the second shot will deal bonus damage.
Weapon1.SecondaryD: Marks an enemy with repost tag, their location is revealed, any damage they take from an ally detonates the mark and deals bonus damage.

Ability1D: Gain attack speed, and increased damage for a short duration.
Ability2D: Channel for 5 seconds, stalk to reveal a random enemy's location on the map.
PassiveD: After scoring a takedown or assist, gain bonus movement speed and reduce / refresh Keyboard warrior cooldown.
